title: Jacob Rees-Mogg – 2022 Comments on Government’s Emergency Statement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jacob Rees-Mogg, the Secretary of State for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy, on Twitter on 17 October 2022.
content:
Ensuring a strong UK economy means having a firm grip on public finances. I am pleased that the Chancellor has announced we will keep energy support for businesses and households in place this winter, with a view to continuing that support in a more targeted way in the future.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
